TERM: Inference-Time Invariant Check

DEFINITION:
Before returning a KG answer, verifies core invariants via lightweight decompressions/tests; fails closed to LLM fallback upon violation.

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Runtime invariants guard KG answers; on violation, fails closed and routes to LLM fallback; logs event.

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Guard detected configuration mismatch; routed to LLM for verification.

CATEGORY: SystemPolicy

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: RuntimeGuard; applies_to: KnowledgegraphrouteR; signals: LlmresponseinterceptoR
